https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bCr19UZvf4IKo1WSt7K6E4wpifp.jpg Yukina Minato gathers members intertwined with different thoughts to form a band and participate at the Future World Fes. This is the story of their "promise" from their formation to the challenge of the music festival. BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia I: Promise
